law.catch_line: Association without capital stock subject to Chapter 271B.
law.text: The provisions of KRS Chapter 271B shall apply, so far as appropriate, to every association with or without capital stock heretofore or hereafter organized or domesticated under this chapter, except where the provisions of such laws are in conflict with or inconsistent with this chapter.
law.history: Amended 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 274, sec. 152. -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 35.
